DOC.brief_summary: A double-blind , randomize , single-centre , placebo-controlled , crossover study investigate effect single oral dose AZD1386 intradermal capsaicin evoke pain symptom heat sensitivity healthy volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Study Investigate Effects Single Oral Dose AZD1386 ( Capsaicin )
DOC.criteria: Clinical normal physical finding , include BP , pulse rate > 45 bpm , ECG laboratory assessment Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≥18 ≤30 kg/m2 weight ≥50 ≤100 kg . Nonfertile female History hypersensitivity , allergy atopic/skin disease judge Investigator . History somatic psychiatric disease/condition , may interfere objective study judge Investigator .
